explanation: [0-0] In a room, a black TV and TV stand can be seen on the left. There is a green object on the TV stand. The room's walls are yellowish-green with a dreamcatcher hanging on them. The wall on the right side is white and decorated with paintings.

[0-4] A woman in grey clothing runs in from the right side and quickly moves to the left. Following her, a person wearing a grey jacket and a red cartoon hat walks in from the right, holding a frying pan in their right hand and moving towards the left. Behind them, a girl wearing a colorful dress and hair ornaments walks to the left, holding a large spoon in her right hand.
